title: Transcription
description: Convert spoken content from saved audio or YouTube videos into accurate, downloadable text.

title: Summary
description: Generate concise and detailed summaries from your transcriptions to enhance learning and retention.

title: Flashcard
description: Turn key concepts from transcriptions into interactive flashcards to reinforce knowledge.

title: Quiz
description: Test your understanding with multiple-choice and written-response quizzes based on your transcripts.
